concept.title: Select
concept.shortdesc: The Select function selects nodes to execute a command.

conbody.p: By default, nodes are in a dormant or Deselected state. To perform commands, nodes must first be switched to "on" mode using the Select function.
Once nodes have been selected, future actions will be performed only on those nodes and can be executed by clicking a verb or sequence of verbs.

Selected nodes can be identified in three ways: Identifying Selected Nodes:
Location Characteristic
Set/Class Bins Selected Set or Class types will have a darker shade
Current Command Line
If nodes were selected by type, the name of the Set or Class type will be listed.
If nodes were selected in the Graph (by manually clicking the nodes), an abreviated version of the node names will be listed.
Graph Selected nodes will be bolded
Nodes can be selected both manually and using the Command Tab.
